name: elevenlabs-player
description: Audio Player MCP Bundle with ElevenLabs integration. Generate speech, sound effects, and music using the ElevenLabs API, or play any local audio file. Features playlist view, playback controls, progress bar, and speed adjustment.

output_dir.title: Output Directory
output_dir.description: Directory to save generated audio files (defaults to Desktop)

tools.name: play_audio
tools.description: Plays existing local audio files. Only for files on disk - not needed after generate tools.

tools.name: load_audio
tools.description: Loads audio data for playback. Called internally by the player UI.

tools.name: generate_tts
tools.description: Generates speech from text. Shows player automatically.

tools.name: generate_sound_effect
tools.description: Generates sound effects from prompts. Shows player automatically.

tools.name: generate_music
tools.description: Generates music from prompts. Shows player automatically.
